description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              Finance and  HR:
              
              1.	Overall managing Financial Accounting works of Accounting dept .
              
              2.	Update all change on new governmental policies on finance, tax and
              
              training staff on those news.
              
              3.	Prepare or support staff to prepare monthly, annually statements & final checking before send to Management.
              
              4.	Coordinate on annually budget
              
              5.	Oversee IT related matters & co-ordinate with IT Manager in Singapore.
              
              6.	Play an advisory role in aspects of accounting, finance, controlling, corporate governance to assist Operations Manager  in achieving both long term development and short-term annual targets
              
              7.	Other assignments that the Management may request from time to time.
              

              Purchase:
              
              1.	Involve in purchasing of goods and assist in sourcing and planning with good coordination and follow-up skills.
              
              2.	Manage inventory levels
              
              3.	Check for the accuracy of invoice received, enclosed PO and sign the invoice or contact the end user or contract signatory to verify invoices received.
              
              4.	Files all documents and approvals pertaining to order.
              
              5.	Build and maintain good relationship with current and new vendors.
              
              6.	Sourcing for competitive Import & Export rate.
              
              7.	Provide general administrative and quality management support.
              

              Position:	Chief Accountant
              
              Department:	Finance
              
              Areas of responsibility: Accounting, Finance, Taxation, Co. Secretary, Human Resources, Administration, Purchase
              
              Immediate Superior: Operation Manager, Vietnam
